Definition: The input will be a tweet. The tweet can be one of three things: Hate Speech, Offensive, or Normal. Hate Speech and Offensive tweets target one community out of the nine values. These values are: 'African', 'Islam', 'Jewish', 'Women', 'Refugee', 'Arab', 'Caucasian', 'Hispanic', and 'Asian'. If the tweet does not target any community, the output will be 'None'.
